statements: SELECT * FROM data_cleanup_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM data_cleanup_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM data_cleanup_tasks;
SELECT * FROM data_cleanup_tasks WHERE task_status = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM data_cleanup_tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description, task_status FROM data_cleanup_tasks WHERE task_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM data_cleanup_tasks WHERE task_status = TRUE ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, UPPER(task_name) AS uppercase_task_name FROM data_cleanup_tasks WHERE task_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name, LENGTH(task_description) AS description_length FROM data_cleanup_tasks WHERE LENGTH(task_description) > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT task_status FROM data_cleanup_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'data%';
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_status = true;
SELECT preprocess_id, preprocess_name FROM preprocessing_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preprocessing_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_status = TRUE;
SELECT preprocess_id, preprocess_name FROM preprocessing_tasks WHERE preprocess_status = FALSE;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_status FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT preprocess_id, preprocess_name, preprocess_description FROM preprocessing_tasks WHERE preprocess_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks JOIN preprocessing_tasks ON data_cleaning_tasks.task_id = preprocessing_tasks.preprocess_id;
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM data_preprocessing_steps ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT step_id, step_name, step_status FROM data_preprocessing_steps WHERE step_status = 'active';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, count(*) as task_count FROM data_cleaning_tasks GROUP BY task_name HAVING task_count > 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%cleaning%' ORDER BY task_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.task_name, p.step_name, l.log_message FROM data_cleaning_tasks d INNER JOIN data_preprocessing_steps p ON d.task_id = p.step_id INNER JOIN preprocessing_logs l ON p.step_id = l.step_id;
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks;
SELECT task_name, created_at FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM cleaning_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT result_name, result_description FROM analysis_results WHERE step_id = 2;
SELECT step_name, step_id FROM process_steps WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks ORDER BY created_at DESC, task_name ASC
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_id = 1
SELECT p.step_name, p.step_description, c.log_message FROM process_steps p JOIN cleaning_logs c ON p.step_id = c.step_id
SELECT a.result_name, a.result_description, p.step_name FROM analysis_results a JOIN process_steps p ON a.step_id = p.step_id WHERE p.step_id = 2
SELECT task_id, COUNT(*) AS num_steps FROM process_steps GROUP BY task_id HAVING num_steps > 2 ORDER BY num_steps DESC
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM data_cleaning_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT step_name, step_description, step_order FROM data_preprocessing_steps WHERE step_order > 2;
SELECT log_id, task_id, log_timestamp FROM preprocessing_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_cleaning_tasks;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM preprocessing_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM data_cleaning_tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT task_id, task_name, step_name FROM data_cleaning_tasks JOIN cleaning_step_mapping ON data_cleaning_tasks.task_id = cleaning_step_mapping.task_id JOIN data_preprocessing_steps ON cleaning_step_mapping.step_id = data_preprocessing_steps.step_id;
